name: Portland

authority.name: Portland Bureau of Transportation / Multnomah County Circuit Court
authority.authority_name: Portland Bureau of Transportation (PBOT) and Multnomah County Circuit Court
authority.serves_description: Parking citations issued by the City of Portland are processed through the Multnomah County Circuit Court.

citation_pattern.notes: Portland parking citations often begin with the letters 'HA' when viewed online.

submission_methods.notes: To contest a citation, mail a written explanation or request a hearing; in-person hearings are available at the court.

phone_confirmation.department: Multnomah County Circuit Court Parking Tag Office
phone_confirmation.purpose: Confirm that this is the correct Phase-1 mailing address and procedure for City of Portland parking citation appeals.

verification.source_note: Mailing address and contest instructions confirmed on Portland.gov – pay and contest parking ticket page, which states that written explanations and payments should be mailed to P.O. Box 78, Portland, OR 97207 and provides the Parking Tag Office phone number【180675364249953†L82-L95】【180675364249953†L115-L150】.

official_confirmation_department: Multnomah County Circuit Court Parking Tag Office
official_confirmation_purpose: Confirm Phase-1 appeal mailing addresses and issuing authority routing.
qa_known_gaps: University of Portland citation appeal mailing address is not provided and requires confirmation.
